name: metabolite profiling assay
description: An assay that detects and identifies chemical entities resulting from biochemical and cellular metabolism

name: protein expression profiling assay
description: An assay that determines protein expression and translation activity using protein extracts collected from a material entity.

name: reduced representation bisulfite sequencing assay
description: A bisulfite sequencing assay that identifies genomic methylation patterns using a bisulfite based protocol that enriches CG-rich parts of the genome.

name: single-value binding of antibody with reporter to antigen assay
description: An assay that detects the linking of antigens and antibodies via special signaling mechanisms, such as EIA, ELISA, chemiluminescence, etc. that produces one measure (quantitative or qualitative) of the analyte of interest

name: bulk assay for transposase-accessible chromatin using sequencing
description: An assay for transposase-accessible chromatin using sequencing in which the sample that is sequenced is derived from a collection of cells, such as a tissue sample or entire cell culture, and therefore provides results representative of the aggregate of sample cells.

name: bulk RNA-seq assay
description: An RNA-seq assay in which the sample that is sequenced is derived from a collection of cells, such as a tissue sample or entire cell culture, and therefore provides results representative of the aggregate of sample cells.
